title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 16 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2014 to 2012, gradually decreasing from 2012 to 2011, rapidly increasing from 2011 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2006, and lastly rapidly decreasing from 2006 to 1999.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2010.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 1358.0 was recorded at Year 2010
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 5.5 was recorded at Year 1999
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2010 to 1999.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2010.
